item.title: KY Consortium Brings Better Access to Deaf/Hard-of-Hearing
item.description: The deaf/hard-of-hearing community in Kentucky totals approximately 400,000 people. In order to provide members of this community with equitable access to remote interpreting, a statewide network, the Kentucky Deaf Access Consortium (K-DAC), was created.
